Searching for a recipe for chocolate lava cake.

The recipe for chocolate lava cake includes ingredients such as chocolate, butter, eggs, sugar, and flour. Instructions involve melting chocolate and butter together, mixing with the other ingredients, and baking until the edges are set but the center remains soft.

Can you also tell me the origin of chocolate lava cake?
Plan: 1) Search for the origin of chocolate lava cake. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for the origin of chocolate lava cake.

Chocolate lava cake is believed to have originated in the 1980s, credited to chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten, who popularized this dessert by accidentally undercooking individual chocolate cakes, discovering the soft interior.
